availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis "Frank" M. pool (KY, Marshall County, farmer)

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary E. Pool. Father of William A. Pool. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Marshall County, KY, July 1863, p. 30, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, p. 803
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 188A
Find A Grave, Francis M. Pool (1828-1903)," Memorial #29373295, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29373295 (accessed August 29, 2019).
